amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow the Department of Energy to continue partnering with the Department of Defense to produce biofuels for the military.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 10 printed in part A of House Report 114-120 to allow the Department of Energy to continue partnering with the Department of Defense to produce biofuels for the military.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 215 (Roll no. 255).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 208 - 215 (Roll no. 255).
